content: red panda is worked in 10 pieces legsbody-head 2 front ear panels 2 back ear panels 2 arms 2 paws and a tail 2 legs-body-head is worked in joined rnds see invisible join technique explanation above 3 arms tail and paws are worked in continuous rnds spiral do not join last st of rnds to first st 4 front and back ear panels are worked back and forth in row 5 yarn color is changed to form sections of color stripes and facial features to change yarn color work last st of old color to last yarn over yarn over with new color and draw through all loops on hook to complete st proceed with new color do not cut old color until instructed carry color not in use along tops of sts of previous round and work sts of new color over the carried strand enclosing it inside the fabric
